tabs: Spontaneity Safari: The Candid Capture Challenge

MiniMovie Mania.title: Short Film Competition
MiniMovie Mania.date: From the day after registering till 2nd day of Gandhaar (1st February 2024)
MiniMovie Mania.overview: Dive into creativity with short films in this competition, exploring the art of storytelling within concise cinematic expressions.
rules: Upon completion of registration, it will be considered final; no alterations will be accommodated under any circumstances.
TEAM MUST BE FORMED BY THE STUDENTS OF THE SAME CLASS.
The participants have the liberty to choose any subject or concept of their choice.
The entries can be documentaries, short films, animations, or experimental art forms.
The short film can be in English, Hindi, or Marathi languages.
The total runtime of the Short Film, including opening & closing credits, should strictly be a minimum of 3 minutes and a maximum of 10 minutes.
All content used in the short film must be owned.
The short film must be original and no watermark of any kind should be on the film.
The film must be of the highest quality possible.
Adult content of any kind will not be entertained and would lead to direct disqualification.
Judging process will also be online.
The best films will be featured on the official gandhaar instagram account.
Results will be declared during the prize distribution (3rd February 2024)

Judging criteria:
  • Cinematography/direction,
  • Creativity,
  • Camera angles,
  • Storytelling factor,
  • Video quality,
  • Transition smoothness,
  • Editing skills

Spontaneity Safari: The Candid Capture C.title: Spontaneity Safari: The Candid Capture Challenge
Spontaneity Safari: The Candid Capture C.date: From the Day of registration till 2nd day of Gandhaar
Spontaneity Safari: The Candid Capture C.time: From the Day of registration till 2nd day of Gandhaar
Spontaneity Safari: The Candid Capture C.overview: The 'Spontaneity Safari: Candid Capture Challenge' invites solo participants to embark on a photographic journey capturing candid moments from the fest's vibrant atmosphere. Armed with a camera, participants navigate diverse environments, seeking to immortalise authentic expressions, unexpected interactions, and fleeting scenes. The challenge lies in embracing the spontaneity of photography, where perfect timing and unposed authenticity combine to create unique snapshots. Participants submit their three best captures, showcasing creativity and emotional impact.
rules: Upon completion of registration, it will be considered final; no alterations will be accommodated under any circumstances.

Capture the Moment: Your goal is to capture candid moments during the fest and the preparation of the fest.
(preparation and matches of Pentacle, Pregandhaar, Gandhaar practice, preparation and main Gandhaar till day 2 of Gandhaar)

Event Duration: The spontaneity safari begins from the day you register and extends until the 2nd day of Gandhaar. Participants have the flexibility to capture moments at any time within this timeframe.
Some of the best photos will be displayed in the Art Gallery 2nd February 2024.
Eligibility: Open to all photography enthusiasts, amateur or professional.
No Interruptions: You must not interfere with the scene or subjects while capturing the moment.
Participant’s best clicks will be displayed on the post/stories, also credit will be given to the particular participant.
Authenticity Matters: No editing or manipulation allowed.
Respect Privacy: Always be mindful of people's privacy and boundaries.
Equipment: Use any camera or smartphone. The focus is on the moment captured, not the gear used.

Submission Guidelines: Participants must submit their 3 best candid captures through the (Google form or the coordinators will inform you about this later). Ensure that the image resonates with the theme of spontaneity and remains unaltered for authenticity.
Judging Criteria: Creativity, originality, emotional impact, and adherence to the rules will be the key factors for judging. Judging will be done through online mode only.
Originality: Only original photographs captured during the challenge period are accepted.
Winners will be announced during prize distribution on 3rd February 2024.

Costume Chronicles: Photographic Fantasi.title: Cosplay Photography with Model
Costume Chronicles: Photographic Fantasi.date: From the Day of registration till 2nd day of Gandhaar
Costume Chronicles: Photographic Fantasi.time: From the Day of registration till 2nd day of Gandhaar
Costume Chronicles: Photographic Fantasi.overview: Cosplay Competition is a popular event where participants are expected to dress up in costumes and accessories to represent their favorite fictional character from movie, video games, comic books, anime etc. Cosplayers usually go above and beyond to embody the character’s personality, gestures, and mannerism.
rules: Upon completion of registration, it will be considered final; no alterations will be accommodated under any circumstances.
The model and the photographer should be from the same division.
All the teams have the liberty to choose any cosplay of their choice.
This event begins from the day you register and extends until the 2nd day of Gandhaar.
Participants have the flexibility to conduct photoshoots at any time within this timeframe.
Some of the best photos will be displayed in the Art Gallery on 2nd February 2024.
Open to all photography enthusiasts, amateur or professional.
Participant’s best clicks will be displayed on the post/stories on our official Gandhaar Instagram account, also credit will be given to the particular participant.
Good editing will be allotted extra points.
Use any camera or smartphone. The focus is on the moment captured, not the gear used.
Participants must submit their 3 best captures as & when instructed by the coordinators.
Judging Criteria: Creativity, originality, emotional impact, and adherence to the rules will be the key factors for judging. Judging will be done through online mode only.
Only original photographs captured during the challenge period are accepted.
Winners will be announced during prize distribution on 3rd February 2024.

Essence of Motion.title: Theme-based photography film
Essence of Motion.date: From the Day of registration till 2nd day of Gandhaar
Essence of Motion.time: From the Day of registration till 2nd day of Gandhaar
Essence of Motion.overview: A theme-based photography film is a creative project where participants produce a short film by sequencing carefully composed photographs around a specific theme or concept. Unlike conventional films, these projects rely solely on visual storytelling through a series of images, using elements like composition, lighting, and colour to convey emotions, messages, or narratives. The theme provides a central focus, guiding participants to explore diverse interpretations and perspectives within the framework of their chosen subject. The final product is a visually engaging slideshow or montage that captures a unique and artistic exploration of the chosen theme.
rules: Upon completion of registration, it will be considered final; no alterations will be accommodated under any circumstances.
Teams have the liberty to choose a theme/topic of their choice. (eg. Freedom, poverty, happiness, etc)
Team must try to convey a story on that theme in (maximum) 30 pictures.
Minimal editing is allowed on images but manipulation of contents of images is not allowed.
This event begins from the day you register and extends until the 2nd day of Gandhaar.
Participants have the flexibility to capture moments at any time within this timeframe.
Open to all photography enthusiasts, amateur or professional.
Participant’s best clicks will be displayed on the post/stories on our official Gandhaar Instagram account, also credit will be given to the particular participant.
Use any camera or smartphone. The focus is on the moment captured, not the gear used.
Participants must submit all their captures as & when instructed by the coordinators.
Judging Criteria: Creativity, originality, emotional impact, and adherence to the rules will be the key factors for judging. Judging will be done through online mode only.
Only original photographs captured during the challenge period are accepted.
Winners will be announced during prize distribution on 3rd February 2024.
Decision of the judges will be final and binding.
